name: dbcode
description: Database management in Visual Studio Code

viewsWelcome.contents:
Enable History to record SQL commands.
[Enable history](command:dbcode.history.enable)

view/item/context.when: view == dbcode.history.view && (viewItem == query || viewItem == database || viewItem == connection)

salt.description: %The key to encrypt the password with when saving%

enumDescriptions: %It will not be saved, you will be prompted for it when connecting each time.%
%It will not be saved, you will be prompted for it ONCE when connecting each time VSCode starts.%
%It will be saved in settings as plain text (not recommended).%
%It will be encrypted and saved in settings using an encryption string. You will be prompted to enter an encryption string which will encrypt the password.%
%It will be saved in VS Code secret storage%
%It will not be saved, you will be prompted for it when connecting each time.%
%It will not be saved, you will be prompted for it ONCE when connecting each time VSCode starts.%
%It will be saved in settings as plain text (not recommended).%
%It will be encrypted and saved in settings using an encryption string. You will be prompted to enter an encryption string which will encrypt the password.%
%It will be saved in VS Code secret storage%

dbcode.maxTabs.markdownDescription: %Limit the number of tabs saved in the results%

dbcode.warnBeforeExecuteFullDoc.markdownDescription: %Warn before executing the full content of the document%

dbcode.warnBeforePreApply.markdownDescription: %Warn before running pre apply SQL when applying a file%

dbcode.maxRowsToFetch.markdownDescription: %Maximum number of rows to fetch when opening a table or view%

dbcode.history.recordsPerDatabase.markdownDescription: %Number of records to store per database%

dbcode.color.applyToActiveTabBorder.markdownDescription: %Apply connection color to the active editor tab lower border%

dbcode.color.applyToActiveTabBorderTop.markdownDescription: %Apply connection color to the active editor tab top border%

dbcode.color.applyToActiveEditorTabBackg.markdownDescription: %Apply connection color to the active editor tab background%

dbcode.color.applyToStatusBarBackground.markdownDescription: %Apply connection color to the Status Bar background%

dbcode.color.applyToCommandCenterBackgro.markdownDescription: %Apply connection color to the Command Center background%
